name: Loophole Kingdom
description:
This game was a submittion to Ludum Dare 47: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/loophole-kingdom   

   I haven't done LD solo in a while, but here I went, trying to do something different. I hope you enjoy it. Thanks for playing!

PREMISE

       The Kingdom has fallen into disorder! No-one knows why, but there is a theory that King George isn't who he says he is...

CONTROLS

  • UP/DOWN ARROWS -  Up and Down
  • SPACE - Select/Accept

The game features SIX different endings. Can you get them all?

CREDITS
